title: 2 BR/1BA-Cleveland Hts -Cain Park, Heat Included
neighborhood: 1823 Lee Road, Cain Park, Cleveland Heights, OH
map_address: 1823 Lee Road, Cain Park, Cleveland Heights, OH
street_address: 1823 Lee Road, Cain Park, Cleveland Heights, OH
app_fee: Application fee is $30 for one and $50 for two people
posting_body: Welcome to Cain Park apartments, conveniently located near University Circle and the area's top hospitals and colleges/universities.
Many new High Resolution Security Cameras protect all parking lots , driveways, staircases ,  hallways and doors.
This large two bedroom is freshly painted and renovated.
It offers two walk-in closets, refrigerator, range, dishwasher and a central air condition unit.
The building has an elevator, on-site laundry facilities and free outdoor parking.
Enclosed parking is available for an additional fee.
Rent includes heat, water, sewer and trash pick up.
The building is conveniently located on a bus line and within walking distance to restaurants, grocery stores, other retail shops and Cain Park.
It is close to University Circle, Cleveland Clinic and University Hospital.
No pets allowed.
This building has a no smoking policy.
It is a smoke-free property, meaning that anyone found to be smoking in the building is faced with the loss of their security deposit and possible eviction.
No Section 8.
Six month leases are available, but come with additional rent and additional conditions.
Rent starts at $845.
Requirements:

FICO scores 670+ require a security deposit same as one month rent, stable employment, proof of income, favorable rental history, no criminal record in the past ten years,  and no evictions within last five years.
Scores 640 to 669 require a double security deposit.
Scores 600 to 639 require a double security deposit and a co-signer with a FICO credit score of over 700.
No Section 8.
No pets allowed.
How to contact us:
- Please send your FICO credit score, the type of business, your cell number, and any questions to this email address.
- Please first respond by email and then also call
show contact info
and leave a message.
- If you do not get respond within 48 hours, please, then, first text (only) Carole at 2216-538-0813; and finally contact text (only)
